title: Roasted Artichoke and Pepper Bruschetta
ingredients: ['1 ciabatta, about 250g', '1 red pepper, thinly sliced', '2 tbsp olive oil (from the jar of artichokes)', '12 slices Milano salami, about 70g in total', '4 tbsp tapenade', '1 jar char-grilled or roasted artichokes in olive oil, about 290g, drained and sliced']
